front.title: •Join Me!
front.gametext: Use 3 Force if Luke was just 'hit' by a lightsaber swung by Vader. Opponent must choose: Place Luke in owner's Used Pile OR Luke may not be forfeited this battle and crosses to the Dark Side at the end of the turn if still on table (is no longer 'hit').
front.lore: '...And together, we can rule the galaxy as father and son!'
